inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of liver disease based on past history, serological testing, radiological imaging, and liver histology
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: available past history, serological testing, radiological imaging, and liver histology

inclusion.criterion: Staging of cirrhosis determined by MELD score and Child-Pugh score
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Current degree of encephalopathy established through preprocedure history and physical examination
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: standard preprocedure history and physical examination

exclusion.criterion: Active alcohol intake during the past 6 weeks
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: patient has been off ETOH for a year (corroborated with pt)

exclusion.criterion: Significant co morbid illness such as heart, respiratory, or renal failure and any neurologic diseases such as alzheimer's disease, parkinson's disease and nonhepatic metabolic encephalopathies
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known allergy to sedative
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients on psychoactive drugs, such as antidepressants or sedatives
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been off ETOH for a year and has no overt encephalopathy. However, there is an increase in his total and direct bilirubin since last visit and an increase in the patient's AFP which could be progression of cirrhosis.
